text: I'd like to add 1 additional page to our template packs. Is the *only* way to do this re-submit every template pack under a new template pack name and then remove the old listings once they get re-approved?
You can add a template to a template pack and resubmit. You just cannot remove templates from a pack.

Hey <@U22PWJ41G> I thought that would be the case but this is the message I see when trying to edit a listing for a template pack. These are templates I made after the packs were approved so the template didn't exist before.
ah, nvm - submit the template individually and then add to the pack

Ah sorry, I can see how that may be confusing. In order for a template to be part of a pack, it has to be approved as a unique listing as well. That is implying that if you want to add a template to a pack, it has to be approved as well.
